advancements.charmony.tweaks.title: Tweaks
advancements.charmony.attracted_villager: Get a villager to follow you
advancements.charmony.converted_dirt_to_: Use a shovel to convert a dirt block to a dirt path
advancements.charmony.converted_path_to_: Use a hoe to convert a dirt path to a dirt block
advancements.charmony.created_suspicious: Push an item into sand or gravel using a piston
advancements.charmony.dismounted_from_sh: Crouch to make a parrot leave its perch
advancements.charmony.extracted_enchantm: Use a book with an enchanted item on a grindstone to extract the item's enchantments
advancements.charmony.ground_animal_armo: Use horse or wolf armor on a grindstone to return leather, scute, gold, iron or diamond
advancements.charmony.healed_near_campfi: Receive a small health boost by resting near a campfire
Use an amethyst shard to hide an item frame
advancements.charmony.dropped_cobwebs.de: Get a Cave Spider to drop a cobweb
advancements.charmony.dropped_potion_of_: Get a Witch to drop a Potion of Luck
advancements.charmony.dropped_sand.title: Sandman
advancements.charmony.dropped_sand.descr: Get a Husk to drop sand
advancements.charmony.piglin_provided_di: Get the direction to a Fortress or Bastion from a Piglin
advancements.charmony.prevented_animal_d: Prevent direct player damage to a tamed animal
advancements.charmony.prevented_crop_dam: Prevent farmland damage while wearing boots enchanted with Feather Falling
advancements.charmony.remained_on_should: Jump while a parrot is perched
advancements.charmony.repaired_netherite: Use netherite scrap to repair a netherite item
advancements.charmony.repaired_trident.d: Use prismarine shards to repair a Trident
advancements.charmony.replanted_crops.de: Use a hoe to simultaneously harvest and replant a crop
advancements.charmony.restocked_current_: Restock your current item when it runs out
advancements.charmony.revived_animal.des: Revive a tamed animal from its nametag using a Totem of Undying
advancements.charmony.transferred_to_shu: Drag an item to a Shulker Box inside your inventory
advancements.charmony.unearthed_mushroom: Use a pig to dig up a mushroom
advancements.charmony.used_totem_from_in: Use a Totem of Undying from your inventory instead of your hand
